modifications to fix some of these
issues Henders dramatically increased
the output I started by adding this big
Torat on top which I just made from some
aluminium ducting now this thing
actually has two functions for one it
increases the capacitance on the
secondary side but also helps prevent
arcs from jumping back and striking
itself because that's a really good way
to destroy secondary coils now i also
adjusted the coupling here between these
two coils unfortunately i destroyed a
couple of my secondaries while doing
that now the biggest problem to tackle
was this rotary spark yet and i'm still
using an angle grinder but the original
design kept burning up electrodes and
just was not firing consistently so i
started by having this custom machined
bakelite disc made for me that holds
these little flying electrodes really
precisely because my original hand
drilled one just wasn't cutting it i
also replaced these static electrodes
here with tungsten rods now these things
last much much longer and i'm getting
way better results with this rotary
spark @ i rewired the main supply here
too
